pr_title: KAFKA-9888: Copy connector configs before passing to REST extensions

timeline.message: KAFKA-9888: Copy connector configs before passing to REST extensions

timeline.author: ncliang

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
Map<String, String> result = connectorConfigCallback.get(herderRequestTimeoutMs, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
return new HashMap<>(result);
return new HashMap<>(connectorConfigCallback.get(herderRequestTimeoutMs, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS););
timeline.author: kkonstantine

timeline.body: I like the improved text. But let's skip `WARNING` since it's not a tag we use in comments (such as TODO: for instance)
timeline.bodyText: I like the improved text. But let's skip WARNING since it's not a tag we use in comments (such as TODO: for instance)
timeline.bodyHTML: I like the improved text. But let's skip WARNING since it's not a tag we use in comments (such as TODO: for instance)
timeline.author: kkonstantine

timeline.body:
My bad. My suggestion inserted a typo. At least I saw it before I start the build. 
```suggestion
            return new HashMap<>(connectorConfigCallback.get(herderRequestTimeoutMs, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS));
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
My bad. My suggestion inserted a typo. At least I saw it before I start the build.

Suggested change
return new HashMap<>(connectorConfigCallback.get(herderRequestTimeoutMs, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS););
return new HashMap<>(connectorConfigCallback.get(herderRequestTimeoutMs, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS));
timeline.author: kkonstantine
